example.eg: Steve's effort at cleaning the kitchen wasn't very good; it was still quite dirty afterwards.
example.egtrans: 斯蒂夫试着清洁厨房，但事后还是不太干净。

example.eg: He hurt his back after so much effort cutting wood.
This picture's a pretty good effort, considering it was done from memory.
example.egtrans: 考虑到这幅画是凭记忆画的，算是画得相当不错了。

dsense.name: a great deal of effort, a good deal of effort

example.eg: I put a great deal of effort into this project, and I was really offended when management ignored it.
The success of the canned food drive was the result of a combined effort by the supermarket and the homeless shelter.
It was a great effort for her to walk up the hill.
They made a great effort to move the heavy rock, but did not succeed.
I have to make a special effort to get along with my co-worker.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 额外努力, 下大工夫

example.eg: You could give up smoking if you just made an effort.  Let's all make an effort to get along.
example.egtrans: 只要你努力，就能成功戒烟。让我们一起努力来和睦相处吧。

example.eg: I didn't manage to finish, but at least I  made the effort.
She made a concerted mental effort to remember all the details.
Please spare no effort to find my sister's killer.

dsense.name: war effort
dsense.guideword: (work done for one's country during war)

example.eg: She was able to complete her degree with effort.
With much effort, he was able to reach the top of the mountain.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常努力地, 相当费力地
